channel.title: How to hack paypal shopping carts
channel.description:
Okay well this is a basic tutorial on how to hack shopping carts through paypal.
You will need: [b][u]FIREFOX and an add-on called tamper data[/b][/u]
Step 1:First go to the page you would like to buy an item from.
Step 2:Select that item add to shopping cart.
Step 3:Go to tools then select Tamper Data. and start tamper
Step 4:Hit proceed to checkout then hit tamper till you get the one with the price after that type in a price like 00.01 and continue to checkout.

item.title: How to hack paypal shopping carts
item.dc:creator: @yoursoul yoursoul
item.description:
@yoursoul wrote:

Yep, they usually manually check them, or they can tell eg rapidshare paypal sends rs a signal back saying how much you payed so if you payed the wrong amount your acct never activates. You can also do this by copying a page source to a txt document and editing the cost then saving it as .html

Read full topic
item.source: How to hack paypal shopping carts

item.title: How to hack paypal shopping carts
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Oh no, it would work as far as letting you pay less money, if in doubt read up on how the paypal shopping cart works.
What I’m saying is that the billing software at the store’s end wouldn’t be stupid enough to blindly accept the order without checking the details.

Read full topic
item.source: How to hack paypal shopping carts

@Mopman wrote:
